title: Kate Green – 2020 Comments on Sacking of Jonathan Slater
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 26 August 2020.
content:
Under this Government civil servants have time and time again taken the fall for the incompetence and failures of Ministers.
